rpgtools.name: Reactive RPG Tools
description: Development started in 2020, when I started DMing.
A collection of references and eventually tools that I've made to suppliment my D&D games.
This was after working on a Blazor version of a similar tool. This was with the intention of learning ReactJS.

projects.name: Unity Tools
description: Assembled over time, starting in ~2016.
A collection of tools made available through the Unity Package Manager

projects.name: Maze Generator
description: Initially developed in ~2015. Recently (2020) refactored.
This project is designed to make maze generation easier.
The eventual goal will be to make this a package that can be included using the Unity Package Manager.

games.name: Pirate Arena
description: Developed in late 2014.
Repo private due to assets used.
games.statusNotes: Developed in Unity 5, some packages used previously now outdated. Some things broken.

applications.name: D&D Tools

applications.name: Melbourne Attractions
description: Built using ReactJS.
Currently reads a json file of attractions around Melbourne and displays them using React components
